title: raadha ramaNa
sahitya:
rAdhA ramaNa rakSamAm anisham

anupallavi

 mAdhava nAgAntaka varavAha sAdhita kauava sainya samUha

caraNam 1

 pANDava pakSa bhakta samrakSa puNDarIkAkSa bhuvanAdhyakSa 
paNDita mAnava pAlana lOla khaNDita dAnava jAla sushIla
 
caraNam 2

 shankara hitavara shankha cakradhara shankara bhaktava shankara rUpa 
pankaja bhava mInAnga janaka hariNAnga ravi nayana sankaTa hara shrI
 
caraNam 3

 rAmacandra parandhAma sArvabhauma rAmadAsanuta nirmala nAma 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata pAlana bhauma
